subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] evp

full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_00BC_01C68FCD.6059E6D0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Amy,
If you don't have any raw audio that german broadcast wav I sent last =
night should work for you. :)
Jody

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 Sumption Frank 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, June 14,=
 2006 3:55 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] evp



   First you have to hit the =
folder icon to open, and load a wav file for the raw audio. I usually use h=
uman speech as the raw audio, but music will work too, it has to be in .wav=
 format. Then you hit the record button at the bottom of the window, then t=
he yellow arrow at the top, and a box should open where you can type in a q=
uestion. When you click ok in the question box, then EVPmaker should run. Y=
ou'll have to play with the "overlap" "z-cross" and "segments" ms setting t=
o find what works best, and produces the easiest to hear voices. The voices=
 come out distorted, and might take some practice to hear. 



   Frank



=

--------------------------------------------------------------------------=
----

  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On B=
ehalf Of Amy Swanson
  Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2006 1:47 PM
  To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] evp



  ok another question abou=
t evpmaker, when i use it i just hit record.....but there is also a "make e=
vp" option! how should i be using this thing?

  i dont seem to get results=
 from audacity with recording, but the playback and cleaning on it is great=
 !

  amy

  Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:

     I starte=
d with reading an article in Popular Electronics on EVP back in 1995. I tri=
ed one recording back then, didn't get anything. I put the magazine away, a=
nd told my self I would try again later. In the magazine, they mostly just =
covered the white noise method. In 2000 I dug out the magazine, and tried E=
VP again, using white noise from the radio, and this time someone spoke to =
me. I've been hooked ever since. Using noise, and having to listen at high =
volume through headphones made my ears ring, so I started searching the web=
 for other methods, and found EVPmaker. I used that program for a couple ye=
ars, but kept getting messages relayed from spirits that couldn't use the c=
omputer. So I decided to try to come up with a more universal method, and a=
fter a couple weeks of thinking about it, my present system kinda popped in=
to my head, fully formed, all I had to do was build it. 

    I still used =
others methods, because there's times when some of the methods don't work, =
so I switch modes to keep getting the voices. Her at work I can use EVPmake=
r pretty consistently, but it hardly ever produces anything at home. 

    =
 Frank





  http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/



  LON3_S7AR  YAHOO =
MESENGER ID

   __________________________________________________
  Do You=
 Yahoo!?
  Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around 
=
  http://mail.yahoo.com
